title: Stylish Coat
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Hey Karin. That’s the first time I’ve seen you wear that coat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh, I bought this a few days ago. I’m happy you noticed. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I see. That long coat really suits you. It looks classy yet trendy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thanks! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Everything you wear looks classy yet trendy, Karin. Is there a trick behind finding clothing like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I don’t think you could call this a trick, but you have to look for things that match you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Things that match you, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah. For example, I usually focus on long coats when I go shopping for coats. Because of my height, long coats tend to look better on me than short coats.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I see...... Karin, can I ask you for a favor? Could you come shopping with me sometime? I want a new coat too, but I’m having trouble finding the right one......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>No problem! 𝅘𝅥𝅮 I’d be happy to look for a nice coat for you, Umi-chan. Let’s go find a great coat together! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
